Name: Grandma's Footsteps
About the game: Inspired by the classic children's game Red Light Green Light, comes Grandma's Footsteps, a game for people who enjoy injustice, pain and cookies. Painstakingly work your way through 6 different levels so that you can fill your tummy with Grandma's cookies... unless Grandma fills your tummy with her buckshot first...
